Text:
Thanks for sharing this! I look forward to watching. I used Nutrasweet for a time, back not too long after its arrival on the market. It was in a cereal I ate and in an ice cream that I had most days. I started to get very bad headaches daily. Then a friend found some information about the neurological issues caused by aspertame and showed them to me. I stopped using it and the headaches stopped immediately. I have not used it since. 
Looking forward to learning more.
Good quality. A must see film, thanks for the up!
